title: "Finish setting up pixel" message not going away, Pixel 4
content:
Drop down menu will have the notification come up every 30 minutes or so, will go away as soon as its clicked on but will always return.
Going into the system settings the message is at the top above "network and internet" with a button that says "Finish setup". Tapping the button does nothing and the message stays.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
